Verizon Communications

Verizon Communications was founded in 2000 and operates in New York, United States. The company engages in the sector 'Telecommunications' (ISIC: 61). The industry belongs to the broader 'Information & Communication' (ISIC: J) sector which includes the production and distribution of information and cultural products, the provision of the means to transmit or distribute these products, as well as data, communications and information technology activities, the processing of data and other information service activities.
